ygData.subject: Re: HE Druid?
ygData.msgSnippet: I play a HE druid, and I love Kan to bits, except for the fact that she has low wis. At 35, I m at 139 wis, which I think is pitiful. My equip is about
ygData.messageBody:
I play a HE druid, and I love Kan to bits, except
for the fact that she has low wis. At 35, I'm at 139
wis, which I think is pitiful. My equip is about
standard for a non-twinked lvl 35. I say, go for it! It
may be a tough first character to play, but once you
know what EQ is all about, more difficult race/class
combos are all about variety. For example, I have a wood
elf warrior who loves trade skills. But you can do
whatever you want. If you want a HE druid, make one! No
one can stop you, and if it is too hard, you can make
a new character and build on what you learned. Good
hunting!<br><br>Kanissa Noryk of Norraths Keepers<br>(Half elf!) Druid of
Tunare for 35 Seasons<br>Rodcet Nife
